EmailTemplate.name: RE: collection - next steps (1332950941.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: collection - next steps (1332950941.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - 90 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Robert, He is what I heard back from our team: It all depends on what the collection agency says once they receive all the information & talk to the client. We will be sending it to them this week and usually hear back from them within a week. They will let us know if they think it is collectable or not or if that changes at some point. We will keep you updated as we here or reach out to the collection agency. Unfortunately there is no set standard time frame, but will hopefully know a little more in a week or two. I will keep you posted. Thanks Robert,Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> Robert Quarg [mailto:quargr@hotmail.com] Sent: Tuesday, March 27, 2012 11:55 AM To: Sara Conde Subject: RE: collection - next steps Hello Sara, Thanks for the info. I was wondering how long I should wait before concluding this is a complete loss? Do these things take two months, three, six? Also, will I be informed that the collection process has simply been terminated. I'm just trying to get information as to gauge my explications. Thanks for your help, RobertFrom: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> To: quargr@hotmail.com <mailto:quargr@hotmail.com> Date: Mon, 26 Mar 2012 16:23:50 -0400 Subject: RE: collection - next stepsHi Robert, No problem. I have let my team know we are ready to move forward. They will handle all communication and efforts with the agency. There is nothing more you need to do at this point. Thanks so much,Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Robert Quarg [mailto:quargr@hotmail.com] <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde%40mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCakRYp0Bky/SWNqTsljmOeZel0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Sent: Monday, March 26, 2012 4:18 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: RE: collection - next steps Hello Sara, Sorry for the dealy... Please go ahead with collection through the collection agency. I understand the collection agency will receive 25% of whatever they recoup. I do have several questions. Will the collection agency contact me directly, and if so do I have any input into the process. Thanks for your follow-up, I'm sorry things had to end like this. Have a good week, Robert From: sconde@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde%40mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCakRYp0Bky/SWNqTsljmOeZel0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> To: quargr@hotmail.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:quargr%40hotmail.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCakRYp0Bky/SWNqTsljmOeZel0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Date: Mon, 26 Mar 2012 15:44:44 -0400 Subject: RE: collection - next stepsHi Robert, Hope you had a nice weekend. I wanted to follow up on collection email below. Can you let us know how you would like to move forward? Thank you,Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. From: Sara Conde Sent: Wednesday, March 21, 2012 4:52 PM To: quargr@hotmail.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:quargr%40hotmail.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCakRYp0Bky/SWNqTsljmOeZel0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Subject: collection - next steps Importance: High Hi Robert, Did you decide on how you wanted to move forward? If you want to move forward with the collection agency I will need an email authoring MBO to work with an outside collection agency acknowledging your understanding that they will recoup 25% of whatever they collect (as we discussed.) Please let me know.
